ygData.subject: Re: SV: [EverQuest] UOvsEQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Correction... EQ does have open PK to anyone if you give the book you start off with to someone I forget who. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Correction... EQ does have open PK to anyone if you give the book you start
off with to someone I forget who.


>From: "Fredrik Persson" <avron@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@egroups.com
>To: <EverQuest@egroups.com>
>Subject: SV: [EverQuest] UOvsEQ
>Date: Tue, 6 Jun 2000 11:10:01 +0200
>
>I wish I knew anything about UO.... Well at least I know EQ does not have
>open PK, unless you choose to play on such a server, otherwise you have to
>be in an arena or /duel someone to be able to kill them...
>EQ is pretty cool now with the expansion out, there's too much equipment to
>be able to determine what is "best" for your class, which is a good
>thing....
>
>- Avron -
>
>
